tool.name: SAGA.shapes_lines.1
tool.command: $__tool_directory__/Code/openapi.py isArrayPOINTS False isArrayORDER False isArraySEPARATE False isArrayELEVATION False output_data_LINES $output_data_LINES name SAGA.shapes_lines.1 POINTS $POINTS ORDER $ORDER SEPARATE $SEPARATE ELEVATION $ELEVATION prefer $prefer response $response outputType_LINES $OutputSection_LINES.outputType_LINES transmissionMode_LINES $OutputSection_LINES.transmissionMode_LINES

param.name: POINTS
param.label: Points
param.help: Points The following data types are allowed in the txt file: json, xml, vnd.google-earth.kml+xml

param.name: ORDER
param.label: Order by...
param.help: Order by... The following data types are allowed in the txt file: csv

param.name: SEPARATE
param.label: Separate by...
param.help: Separate by... The following data types are allowed in the txt file: csv

param.name: ELEVATION
param.label: Elevation
param.help: Elevation The following data types are allowed in the txt file: csv

param.name: response
param.label: Response Type
param.help: Choose 'raw' for raw data or 'document' for document data.

section.name: OutputSection_LINES
section.title: Select the appropriate transmission mode for the output format and the output value
